name: The Feathered Serpent (sage7)
description:
Note about HTML version: If the background appears black, please play a downloadable version.

A story-driven isometric action game inspired by an ancient Aztec creation myth.

Play as Quetzalcoatl, the feathered serpent man, as he embarks upon a quest to recreate humankind.

Made for the Godot Wild Jam 42. Theme: Ancient.
